name: places/ChIJt7BAgaNZwokRYMiItxp7_Co
formattedAddress: 515 Greenwich St #201, New York, NY 10010, USA
adrFormatAddress: 515 Greenwich St #201, New York, NY 10010, USA

originalText.text: I've been referred to these guys by another company, being informed that they already approved my business loan for specific amount. When I contacted them, Jeremy from Bond Street asked me to fill out the application and provide personal information like bank statements, tax returns, etc. Upon submitting all that, I received a quick response: "We're not able to project sufficient business profitability to support your loan request". After wasting my time here, I was approved with another company (will not provide name, as this is not advertising), which didn't have any questions about my business profitability. My advise - don't waste your time with Bond Street, it looks like the goal of this company is not to provide business financing and help small business but to gather your personal and financial details.

originalText.text: You have to be Kidding me LOL. If you want to fill out mounds of paperwork, wait forever and pay 30% interest these are the guys for you. They are crooks. They lie about you being approved, talk down to you and even have you sign loan paperwork so they can get your bank statements, SS #, Financials etc.....It's a scam. Stay clear. All they will do is eat up your time and steal your personal information. O ya the next day I got an approval for 6%. from another company. Bond street will be out of business in the next couple of years based on their business practices. I will repeat they are crooks and thieves. resond back to my post and I will email you all the false promises they made and the actual contracts they wanted me to sign. SCAM SCAM SCAM. I'm sure the NY attorney General will shut these guys down eventually...PERMANENTLY
